Assignments for Developing Data Products course

**Please ensure that you are connected to internet**

## Assignment Week 2 - leaflet

The purpose of this to practice creativity using the `leaflet` package

* Click on this link [St-Kevins](St-Kevins.html) to see interactive map.

## Assignment Week 3 - plotly

The purpose of this assignment is to create a web page presentation using R Markdown that features a plot created with Plotly.

* Click on this link [JJC-Plotly](JJC-plotly.html) to see graphs of Temperature Vs CO2 over the past 2000 years.  The range slider allows you to focus on specific time periods.
